v0.5  8-04-2014  -- Added support for a command line option that specifies the CPU
					usage that counts as "max" for the purposes of the simulation.
					Added vertical partitioning for multiple cores.
v0.4, 7-31-2014  -- Tweaked agitation algorithm. Better colors for 8-color terminals.
v0.3, 7-31-2014  -- Package change to fix build bug.
v0.2, 7-31-2014  -- Changed name of runnable file to same name as project.
v0.1, 7-31-2014  -- Package change to fix build bug.
v0.0, 7-31-2014  -- Initial release.
